name: Caveman Runner (galemius)
description:
This game was a submission for the Ludum Dare 36 game jam and the theme was ancient technology, so we decided to try and make a 2D platformer that was similar to the old load runner games.

You play as a caveman, and your objective is to try and steal the other caveman's fire and get it back to your cave. You must dodge the other cavemen, until you are able to make a spear which will allow you to attack them. In the end, the game was only 2 levels long.

The game itself was made in Phaser, all audio in the game was original, and most of the art was obtained from opengameart.org.

Source code for the game can be found on GitHub here: https://github.com/scottwestover/Ludum-Dare-36
